original_text: For the tribe of the people of Reuben by fathers' houses and the tribe of the people of Gad by their fathers' houses have received their inheritance, and also the half-tribe of Manasseh.
korean_text: 이는 르우벤 자손의 지파와 갓 자손의 지파가 함께 그들의 조상의 가문에 따라 그들의 기업을 받을 것이며 므낫세의 반쪽도 기업을 받았음이니라

sentences.original_text: For the tribe of the people of Reuben by fathers' houses
and the tribe of the people of Gad by their fathers' houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 갓 사람들의 지파는 그 종족 대로

sentences.original_text: and also the half-tribe of Manasseh
